trans-unit.source: This sets the date not only displayed in the frontend as the date posted, but can also be used to time the availability for this posting. Meaning the posting will go live on the date you set here.
Yearly base salarary, not displayed when empty

Set the date until this posting won't be displayed anymore. The end date works inclusively, meaning the posting will become invalid on the day after the end date. If no date was entered the posting will be online for an infinite amount of time.
This image will be displayed as a banner in the detail page. That is why an image with a low height is recommended.
This image will be displayed in the list view, either as Header of the posting or as background (as specified in plugin setting).
